valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 23 Oct 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Fri 24 Oct 2025
general_synopsis: Low Dogger 975 expected German Bight 980 by midday tomorrow. Low Bailey 983 losing its identity
